law.catch_line: Settlement of disputed claim or right.
law.text: A claim or right arising under KRS 383.505 to 383.715 or on a rental agreement, if disputed in good faith, may be settled by agreement.
law.history: Repealed and reenacted 1984 Ky. Acts ch. 176, sec. 6, effective July 13, 1984. -- Created 1974 Ky. Acts ch. 378, sec. 6.
